lead_paragraph: The candidates previewed for an influential pro-Israel audience a debate on foreign policy that could play out this fall if they face each other in the general election.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.print_headline: Clinton and Trump, in Speeches, Vow to Protect Israel but Differ on the Means
headline.main: Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump Vow to Protect Israel but Differ on Means

snippet: The candidates previewed for an influential pro-Israel audience a debate on foreign policy that could play out this fall if they face each other in the general election.
abstract: Presidential front-runners Hillary Clinton and Donald J Trump present starkly contrasting Middle East policies and views on America-Israel relations in separate speeches before 18,000 people at American Israel Public Affairs Committee event.
